name: Topdown (DogeisCut)
description:
This is my first game without tutorials, it is unfinished, its also not very much but I am doing good.

Changelog:

  • 1.0.0: Game is created
  • 1.0.1: More map is created
  • 1.0.2: The moving platform graphic no longer uses the tileset as the texture
  • 1.1.2: The games graphics and audio are overhauled to the modern day graphics, lots of things have animations and particles now, and the game looks slightly 3D. Also coins were added
  • 1.1.3: A basic main menu is created, a single gray button with tiny text that says "play" the game is also no longer exported in debug mode and it also has a taskbar icon.
  • 1.1.4: The main menu is updated to look much nicer, and has music but no sounds, and no background. there is also now a quit button and a disabled options button
  • 1.1.5: Added gems (basically secret coins), and winning a level now has a sound, also level 2 is complete.
  • 1.2.5: Added level 3, changed enemy hitbox to be smaller, changed players hitbox into a circle,
    lots of optimization changes, added coin/gem counter, added checkpoints, upgraded main menu, added fade out in-between levels, most objects unload outside of the screen now, nerfed level 2, changed the players friction to be less slippery due to players slipping into hazards, made some gem placements more dangerous, added screen at the end of unfinished levels, The game is now in a zip.
